context: Can anyone tell me where to get replacement foam covers for these earphones?
response: The last time I replaced mine, I measured the diameter of the speakers (in millimeters) and then shopped Amazon for replacement ones that fit that size of headphones.  Previously, they had always sent me really large Koss ones that I had to throw away.
